uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.direct
Class DefaultDirectMediaPlayer

java.lang.Object
  uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.AbstractMediaPlayer
      uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.DefaultMediaPlayer
          uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.direct.DefaultDirectMediaPlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
DirectMediaPlayer, MediaPlayer
public class DefaultDirectMediaPlayer
extends DefaultMediaPlayer
implements DirectMediaPlayer

Media player implementation that provides direct access to the video frame data.

For the pixel format you can use any format that is supported by the vlc video output, for example:

  • I420: planar 4:2:0, order YUV
  • YV12: planar 4:2:0, order YVU
  • YUY2: packed 4:2:2, order YUYV
  • UYVY: packed 4:2:2, order UYVY
  • RV32: 24-bits depth with 8-bits padding
  • RV24: 24-bits depth (like HTML colours)
  • RV16: 16-bits depth
  • RV15: 15-bits depth (5 per component), 1 bit padding
    • This list may not be exhaustive.

    Create a new media player.

    Parameters:
    libvlc - native library interface
    instance - libvlc instance
    width - width for the video
    height - height for the video
    format - pixel format (e.g. RV15, RV16, RV24, RV32, RGBA, YUYV)
    pitch - pitch, also known as stride
    renderCallback - call-back to receive the video frame data
